verses.text_plain: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
verses.verse_html: 1Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

verses.text_plain: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
verses.verse_html: 2Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
verses.verse_html:
3And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud, ▼
▼ Addar: or, Ard

verses.text_plain: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
verses.verse_html: 4And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

verses.text_plain: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
verses.verse_html:
5And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram. ▼
▼ Shephuphan: or, Shupham

verses.text_plain: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
verses.verse_html: 6And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:

verses.text_plain: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
verses.verse_html: 7And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.

verses.text_plain: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
verses.verse_html: 8And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.

verses.text_plain: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
verses.verse_html: 9And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

verses.text_plain: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.
verses.verse_html: 10And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.

verses.text_plain: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
verses.verse_html: 11And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

verses.text_plain: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
verses.verse_html: 12The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:

verses.text_plain: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
verses.verse_html: 13Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:

verses.text_plain: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
verses.verse_html: 14And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

verses.text_plain: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
verses.verse_html: 15And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

verses.text_plain: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
verses.verse_html: 16And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;

verses.text_plain: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
verses.verse_html: 17And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

verses.text_plain: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
verses.verse_html: 18Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;

verses.text_plain: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
verses.verse_html: 19And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

verses.text_plain: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
verses.verse_html: 20And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,

verses.text_plain: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
verses.verse_html:
21And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi; ▼
▼ Shimhi: or, Shema

verses.text_plain: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
verses.verse_html: 22And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,

verses.text_plain: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
verses.verse_html: 23And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

verses.text_plain: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
verses.verse_html: 24And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

verses.text_plain: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
verses.verse_html: 25And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;

verses.text_plain: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
verses.verse_html: 26And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

verses.text_plain: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
verses.verse_html: 27And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

verses.text_plain: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 28These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife’s name was Maachah:
verses.verse_html:
29And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife’s name was Maachah: ▼
▼ father…: also called Jehiel

footnotes.body_html: ▼ father…: also called Jehiel

verses.text_plain: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
verses.verse_html: 30And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

verses.text_plain: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.
verses.verse_html:
31And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher. ▼
▼ Zacher: or, Zechariah

verses.text_plain: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.
verses.verse_html:
32And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them. ▼
▼ Shimeah: or, Shimeam

verses.text_plain: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi–shua, and Abinadab, and Esh–baal.
verses.verse_html:
33And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi–shua, and Abinadab, and Esh–baal. ▼
▼ Abinadab: also called, Ishui
 , ▼
▼ Esh–baal: or, Ish–bosheth

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Abinadab: also called, Ishui

verses.text_plain: And the son of Jonathan was Merib–baal; and Merib–baal begat Micah.
verses.verse_html:
34And the son of Jonathan was Merib–baal; and Merib–baal begat Micah. ▼
▼ Merib–baal: or, Mephibosheth

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
verses.verse_html:
35And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz. ▼
▼ Tarea: or, Tahrea

verses.text_plain: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
verses.verse_html:
36And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza, ▼
▼ Jehoadah: also called, Jarah

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jehoadah: also called, Jarah

verses.text_plain: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:
verses.verse_html:
37And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son: ▼
▼ Rapha: also called, Rephaiah

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Rapha: also called, Rephaiah

verses.text_plain: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
verses.verse_html: 38And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
verses.verse_html: 39And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

verses.text_plain: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons’ sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
verses.verse_html: 40And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons’ sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
